Module com.javafx.brick_javafx
Package BrickDestroy.Models

Class Crack

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.Models.Crack
public class Crack extends Object
A class that defines the appearance and behaviour of crackable brick.

  • Constructor Details

    • Crack

      public Crack(int crackDepth, int steps)
      Constructor to initialize the data.
      Parameters:
      crackDepth - how deep the crack goes.
      steps - how many cracks in a brick

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public javafx.scene.shape.Path draw()
      A method to return the crack path.
      Returns:
      the crack path.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      A method to remove all the crack path.

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, int direction, javafx.scene.shape.Shape brickFace)
      A method to locate the impact point and bounds of brick, then call the methods to draw the cracks depending on the direction of impact.
      Parameters:
      point - the impact point where the ball collide with the brick.
      direction - the direction where the crack should extend to.
      brickFace - the shape of the brick.

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack(javafx.geometry.Point2D start, javafx.geometry.Point2D end)
      A method to draw the crack lines and store it into a path object.
      Parameters:
      start - the impact point where the ball collide with the brick.
      end - a random point between the bounds of the bricks.

    • randomInBounds

      private int randomInBounds(int bound)
      A method to obtain a random point within the crack depth variable.
      Parameters:
      bound - the crack depth
      Returns:
      the random point within the crack depth.

    • inMiddle

      private boolean inMiddle(int i, int divisions)
      A method to check if the crack steps are in the middle range of first crack and the last crack steps.
      Parameters:
      i - the current crack step.
      divisions - the total crack steps.
      Returns:
      true, if crack steps are not the first nor the final step, otherwise false.

    • jumps

      private int jumps(int bound)
      A method to randomize a point and obtain a random a point if it is more than a predefined probability.
      Parameters:
      bound - the multiplied crack depth.
      Returns:
      the random point within the bound if the probability is greater, else 0;

    • makeRandomPoint

      private javafx.geometry.Point2D makeRandomPoint(javafx.geometry.Point2D from, javafx.geometry.Point2D to, int direction)
      A method to make random points within the brick bounds either in horizontal or vertical direction.
      Parameters:
      from - the starting point of the bounds.
      to - the destination point of the bounds.
      direction - horizontal or vertical direction of the crack.
      Returns:
      the random point within the brick bounds.
